home.faq4Question: Q4: What is the process for creating a custom soundboard?
home.faq4Answer: All you need to do to create your custom soundboard is to sign up for a free account, browse through our library of sounds and select the heart button on any of the buttons to save them. You can create collections of your saved sounds whenever you want.
